creator: raymond.cabrera@brainhunter.com
text:
Hi there,

We have users that are uploading certain PDF files (only happens on some) and when the system extracts the text, when there is a double letter word like 'Mississauga', it comes up as Misisauga - removes the double letter.  This seem to only occur on some PDFs.  Also, issue is not present when using the original Word file.

creator: apache@gagravarr.org
text: For Apache PDFBox bugs, please use the PDFBox JIRA instance at https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/PDFBOX
